speaker: agent
dialogue: I make my way over to one of the businesses I know the Mothfia own, a soda fountain called the Fizzy Fort. I used to hate coming to places like this, but it seems now that I fit in quite well. Things change, People change…

speaker: agent
dialogue: It seems luck has dealt me a few winning cards, I spot him...the Mothfather, the man who runs the seedy underbelly of this city. Lately it seems that he’s losing control of some of his operations, I guess that’s what happens when you grow old in a city that’s always moving.

speaker: agent
dialogue: I have no interest in jokes, Sheila's missing

speaker: agent
dialogue: And you’ll help me locate Sheila?

speaker: agent
dialogue: Alright, I’ll see what I can do

speaker: mothfather
dialogue: I always knew you would come to my table eventually

speaker: mothfather
dialogue: I hope you don’t think I grew kinder in my old age.

speaker: mothfather
dialogue: Now who’s the comedian? You think you can come here and I’ll just GIVE you the information that came from my hard work?

speaker: mothfather
dialogue: Ah! You got me there detective. I had gone into the apartment but only because I have yet to receive the rent payment from that partner of yours. But if I had to guess...I know the Mothfia had their eye on her so go bother them

speaker: mothfather
dialogue: Your old partner Officer Barry, he’s sticking his nose into my business and I would rather he not.

speaker: mothfather
dialogue: I’ll give you all the information about her and where she might be.
